formattedAddress: 120 E 65th St, New York, NY 10065, USA
adrFormatAddress: 120 E 65th St, New York, NY 10065-7072, USA

originalText.text: My experience at Brightwood was terrific! I received the Mini Diamond Glow facial. They truly focus on targeting your skincare concerns and using quality products. I was nervous to try a new place after a bad experience at a facial bar, but the PA knew exactly what she was doing and explained everything so thoroughly. She recommended treatments that would help target my specific concerns, but not in a pushy way.

text.text: My experience at Brightwood was terrific! I received the Mini Diamond Glow facial. They truly focus on targeting your skincare concerns and using quality products. I was nervous to try a new place after a bad experience at a facial bar, but the PA knew exactly what she was doing and explained everything so thoroughly. She recommended treatments that would help target my specific concerns, but not in a pushy way.

originalText.text: Had a wonderful experience here today! The spa is sleek and modern and very clean. Devon welcomed me and was so kind - waters offered upon arrival. Devon did my consult and then my mini facial - both wonderful. Devon has a very interesting career in skin care and beauty and I really felt comfortable with her recommendations for products and services. Not pushy at all and like she genuinely had my skin’s best interest at heart. Will absolutely be returning to try some of the other facials and peels

text.text: Had a wonderful experience here today! The spa is sleek and modern and very clean. Devon welcomed me and was so kind - waters offered upon arrival. originalText.text:
Nestled in between the avenues of the Upper East Side on a beautiful street lined with Brownstones, I was greeted at this chic and stylish facility by Ally (hope I spelled that correctly)!

Ally was a lovely and charming host, who talked me through the process and discussed her own experience with the services offered at The Brightwood Skin suggesting her favorites to me.

For my appointment, the Co-Owner & Founder Devon gave me the Mini Diamond Facial and it was truly a WONDERFUL experience!

Devon took the time to learn about my current skin routine + concerns, and had a consultative approach suggesting next steps. She came across genuine and inviting and was a delight to chat to!

I left with a super glow, and booked a follow up service to try their Chemical Peel next.

What I found most impressive is that both Devon and Ally were knowledgable about the Peel process and understood my concerns about how the process might affect my melanin as a Brown skin girlie. I feel super confident going into my next appointment and look forward to making The Brightwood Skin apart of my regular routine!

text.text:

For my appointment, the Co-Owner & Founder Devon gave me the Mini Diamond Facial and it was truly a WONDERFUL experience!

originalText.text: Every minute of my experience at the Brightwood on the Upper East Side made me feel comfortable and excited to come back! The space itself is clean, cool, and welcoming. Every person I interacted with was warm and friendly — making sure I had everything I needed in preparation for my appointment. Elly, who I had my appointment with, made me feel so comfortable and ensured all my questions were answered. She explained the process thoughtfully and I really trusted both her professional knowledge and her eye for what would look and work best for me. Plus, she has the most gentle hands! Not only was the experience great, but I’m SO happy with the results that I’m seeing! I will be going back and am thrilled to continue trusting the Brightwood team.

text.text: Every minute of my experience at the Brightwood on the Upper East Side made me feel comfortable and excited to come back! The space itself is clean, cool, and welcoming. Every person I interacted with was warm and friendly — making sure I had everything I needed in preparation for my appointment. Elly, who I had my appointment with, made me feel so comfortable and ensured all my questions were answered. She explained the process thoughtfully and I really trusted both her professional knowledge and her eye for what would look and work best for me. Plus, she has the most gentle hands! Not only was the experience great, but I’m SO happy with the results that I’m seeing! I will be going back and am thrilled to continue trusting the Brightwood team.

originalText.text: I was so impressed with the outcome of my Diamond Glow facial that I promptly booked a light pigmentation peel. The entire team, including the receptionist Aly, are incredibly friendly! Devon is highly knowledgeable about the procedures and effective skin enhancement methods for my adult acne. This is a no-nonsense establishment dedicated to overall skincare improvement — and I wholeheartedly recommend it!
